Title: Daum PotPlayer - přehravač přehraje video formáty - AVI,MKV,MP4
Description: PotPlayer is a multimedia (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_player_(software) )  software player developed for the Microsoft Windows (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_Windows )  operating system by South Korean Internet company Kakao (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakao )  (formerly Daum Communications). It competes with other popular Windows media players such as VLC media player (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VLC_media_player ) , mpv (media player) (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mpv_(media_player) ) , GOM Player (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GOM_Player ) , KMPlayer (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KMPlayer ) , SMPlayer (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SMPlayer )  and Media Player Classic (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_Player_Classic ) . Initially, the player was released under the name Daum Live.
Pre-condition:
Nainstalovaný přehravač Daum PotPlayer. Dostupná videa ve formátu AVI, MKV, MP4.

Testováno na Windows 11.
Steps:
1. vybereme soubor AVI, MKV a MP4
2. soubor otevřeme a přehrajeme
Expected Result: Soubor se bez problémů přehraje.

Initially, the player was released under the name Daum Live.[1] (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/PotPlayer#cite_note-:0-1 )
Pre-condition:
Nainstalovaný přehrávač Daum Potplayer. Dostupné soubory ve formátech mp3, flac, cue.

Expected Result: Soubor se nám v pořádku přehraje.

Title: FormatFactory - aktualizace programu
Description: FormatFactory is an ad-supported (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adware )  freeware (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freeware )  multimedia (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multimedia )  converter that can convert video, audio, and picture files. It is also capable of ripping DVDs and CDs to other file formats, as well as creating .iso (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.iso )  images. It can also join multiple video files into one.
Steps:
1. klikneme na tlačítko Stáhněte si prosím oficiální verzi.
2. stiskneme download
Expected Result: Program se v pořádku zaktualizuje.

Title: FormatFactory - přenese DVD do video souboru

2. vybereme požadované vlastnosti - název, typ, zvuk, titulky
3. stiskneme konvertovat
Expected Result: Soubor ze přenese do zvoleného formátu.

Expected Result: Soubor se nám rozdělí na video stopu a audio stopu.

Title: FormatFactory - záznam nahrávání nám nahraje celou obrazovku
Description: FormatFactory is an ad-supported (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adware )  freeware (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freeware )  multimedia (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multimedia )  converter that can convert video, audio, and picture files. It is also capable of ripping DVDs and CDs to other file formats, as well as creating .iso (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.iso )  images. It can also join multiple video files into one.
Steps:
1. v sekci video klikneme na tlačítko Záznam nahrávání
2. objeví se nám políčko Záznam nahrávání 
3. stiskneme klávesu F6
4. najedeme na lištu - objeví se tam Recording
5. klávesou F8 záznam vypneme
Expected Result: Nahraje se nám záznam celé obrazovky.

Title: FormatFactory - sloučení dvou videjí a fotky dohromady včetně zvukové stopy
Description: FormatFactory is an ad-supported (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Adware )  freeware (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Freeware )  multimedia (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multimedia )  converter that can convert video, audio, and picture files. It is also capable of ripping DVDs and CDs to other file formats, as well as creating .iso (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/.iso )  images. It can also join multiple video files into one.
Steps:
1. v sekci video klikneme na tlačítko Video sloučení & Mux
2. klikneme na přidat soubory
3. vybreme dva soubor ve formátu MP4
4. přidáme tři fotky
5. proházíme v tomto pořadí - fotka - video - fotka - video - fotka
6. stiskneme OK
7. stiskneme zelené tlačítko spustit
Expected Result: Dva video soubory + fotky se nám sloučí včetně zvukové stopy.

Title: Dimenze kvality  -  funkčnost - Daum PotPlayer - přehraje formáty - MP4, MKV, AVI, FLAC, MP3, MPG
Description: PotPlayer is a multimedia (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_player_(software) )  software player developed for the Microsoft Windows (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_Windows )  operating system by South Korean Internet company Kakao (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kakao )  (formerly Daum Communications). It competes with other popular Windows media players such as VLC media player (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/VLC_media_player ) , mpv (media player) (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mpv_(media_player) ) , GOM Player (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GOM_Player ) , KMPlayer (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/KMPlayer ) , SMPlayer (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SMPlayer )  and Media Player Classic (Link: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Media_Player_Classic ) . Initially, the player was released under the name Daum Live.
Steps:
1. vytvoříme složku
2. do ní dáme tyto formáty: MP4, MKV, AVI, FLAC, MP3, MPG
3. všechny otevřeme pomocí Daum Potplayeru
Expected Result: Všechny soubory se přehrajou bez přerušení.
